participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and friendly, enjoys engaging with others and sharing experiences.
participant_1.background: i've three dogs. my father was a door to door salesman. i like to watch the olympics. i'm in an open polyamorous relationship. i also have a dog walking business.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and caring, with a great appreciation for storytelling and personal connections.
participant_2.background: horror movies are my favorites. i've a son who is in junior high school. my father used to work for home depot. i spent a decade working in the human services field.
